name: Punch monk
description:
You're a monk and you can jump/propel yourself by punching the terrain.

This game was developed during the COVID craze when everyone, including me started streaming. Once I gave up with streaming I left the game as is.

[Click here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4Bn5N3u1EE4) to watch the (sped up) livestream development of this prototype.
